General.Name: Moskovskaya Birzha OAO
General.Description: Public Joint-Stock Company Moscow Exchange MICEX-RTS, an integrated exchange, provides competitive trading, clearing, settlement, depository, and information services to financial market participants. The company operates on the foreign currencies exchange, government securities and money, derivative financial instruments, equities, corporate and regional bonds, and commodities markets. It also provides post-trade services, as well as repository, banking, collateral management, client, and technological services; engages in the fintech start-up business; and operates multifunctional trading platform for equities, bonds, derivatives, currencies, money market instruments, carbon emissions, precious metals, grain, and raw sugar. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Moscow, Russia.
